direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve the class type based on a character input, with getValueType being the newer version.
Both methods process character inputs to determine specific properties (class type or value code).
parsePattern uses getValueType to determine the type of options in a pattern string.
Both methods involve class type determination, though one is from a character and the other from a string.
Both methods involve type handling and conversion, though one is more specific to CLI options.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
